violations_detected.title: Echo method not used
violations_detected.evidence: Customer name 'Евгений' was repeated by operator ('Евгений') but NO explicit confirmation request ('Верно?', 'Правильно?', 'Подтвердить?') was made. Echo method requires both repeat AND confirmation.

violations_detected.title: No thank you for waiting
violations_detected.evidence: After information search (19.4s duration), operator provided closing 'Спасибо за звонок, всем добра, до свидания' but no 'спасибо за ожидание' (thank you for waiting) was expressed.

coaching_priorities.issue: Echo method not used for contact data collection
coaching_priorities.recommendation: When customer provides name or other contact information, MUST repeat it back AND ask explicit confirmation: 'Ваше имя Евгений, верно?' - wait for customer 'Да' or 'Верно' confirmation

coaching_priorities.issue: Missing gratitude for customer patience during search
coaching_priorities.recommendation: After completing information search, thank customer for waiting: 'Спасибо за ожидание!' before providing the information. This improves customer satisfaction.

7.1.evidence: Proper greeting: 'Здравствуйте. Компания 74 колеса. Меня зовут Ирина. Как я могу к вам обращаться?' Professional closing: 'Спасибо за звонок, всем добра, до свидания'

7.2.evidence: Customer name 'Евгений' repeated but no explicit confirmation request ('Верно?')
7.2.note: Critical: Echo method requires BOTH repeat and confirmation request

7.4.evidence: No operator interruptions detected in transcript

9.1.evidence: Search duration 19.4s (first search), 8.4s (second search), both under 40s

9.3.evidence: No 'спасибо за ожидание' detected after 19.4s search completion
9.3.note: Only general 'Спасибо за звонок' in closing, not specific to waiting

3.1.evidence: Customer request addressed: found specific disk (10k), explained unavailability of alternatives, offered selection service

3.6.evidence: Operator announced search ('сейчас посмотрю') before providing product information (code, price, availability)

5.1.evidence: Provided: product code (32-67-26), price (10,000), availability (one in stock), size (R-19)

10.2.evidence: Information delivered per script structure with logical flow and proper opening/closing

10.3.evidence: Used customer name 'Евгений' multiple times, maintained conversation control, professional tone

10.6.evidence: Product information (code, price, availability, specifications) delivered confidently and accurately

2.1.evidence: Normal call ending, no abrupt disconnect or refusal

1.1.evidence: Professional, polite tone throughout. No profanity or harsh language detected

4.1.evidence: Customer was cooperative, operator maintained professional engagement

positive_observations: Professional greeting with company name and operator identification
Used customer name consistently throughout conversation
Efficiently located product information (19.4s search time)
Provided detailed product specifications (code, price, availability, size)
Offered alternative solutions and follow-up service
Proper call closing with professional farewell

data_quality.confidence_notes: High confidence assessment enabled by word-level timestamps and clear VTT transcript
